accessible.helper: Changes the behaviour of the settings screens to make them more accessible. This will dynamically change this page, but you still need to save the setting.

startupdelay.helper: Add a delay before the Cumulus tries to start reading the station. Set to zero to disable. Note if a start-up ping host is specified, this timer will run before the ping. Time in seconds

startupdelaymaxuptime.helper: The maximum system uptime to apply the delay. If the system uptime is greater than this value then the delay will not be applied. Set to zero to disable (delay will always be applied). Time in seconds

startuphostping.helper: Add a hostname or IP to address to ping at start-up. Cumulus waits until the ping is successful before trying to read from your station. Leave blank to disable

startuppingescape.helper: Specify a time after which if no ping response is received carry on starting Cumulus MX anyway. Ignored if the host ping field is blank. Time in minutes

helpers: Enter a task (program/scripts etc) to run before Cumulus MX starts up fully
Note: You must enter a full path to the task, unless it is in the Cumulus MX root folder

taskparams.helper: Optional parameters for the start-up task

wait.helper: Should Cumulus wait for the start-up task to complete (terminate) before continuing?

helpers: If a 'data stopped' event occurs because some or all of the station data is not updating, then exit Cumulus MX to prevent a flat line being logged
Note: the data stopped event can be suppressed by the station 'No sensor check' setting

datastoppedmins.helper: Specify the number of minutes to wait after the data stopped event for it to clear before exiting

helpers: Enter a task (program/scripts etc) to run when Cumulus MX is about to exit
Note: You must enter a full path to the task, unless it is in the Cumulus MX root folder
Note: Cumulus does not wait for this task to complete

taskparams.helper: Optional parameters for the shutdown task, this can string can contain web tags

debuglogging.helper: Enable extra diagnostic logging to the MX diags files.

datalogging.helper: Enable diagnostic logging to the MX diags files of data transfers from the station.

helpers: Log FTP activity to ftplog.txt and to MX diags for diagnostic purposes
Note: SFTP only logs to the MX diags file and PHP upload logging is included in debug/data logging

emaillogging.helper: Enable extra SMTP logging to the smtp.log file in the MXdiags folder.

spikelogging.helper: Enable the logging of data spike and limit violations to MX diags files.

stopsecondinstance.helper: Prevent multiple instances of Cumulus running. This setting requires a restart to take effect

listwebtags.helper: Every time Cumulus MX is started it will create listing of all web tags in the 'WebTags.txt' file.

use24hrtime.helper: Default enabled shows 24 hour times on the dashboard, disabling shows 12 hour times with AM/PM

removespacefromdateseparator.rightLabel: Remove space character from date separators (if present)
helpers: CAUTION: Changing this may render your existing data files unreadable by Cumulus MX
Globally change the default date separator for your locale by removing any spaces. Eg. change 'dd. mm. yy' to 'dd.mm.yy'
